name: Orchidia Fragrances Cool Blue Fragrance (ORC2102882)
description: Orchidia Fragrances Cool Blue Fragrance (ORC2102882) is a liquid fragrance characterized by its compliance with the International Fragrance Association (IFRA) standards, ensuring safety and quality. This fragrance is not listed under California Proposition 65, indicating it does not contain substances known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm as per the state of California. The fragrance profile is described as "cool blue," suggesting a refreshing and invigorating scent, ideal for various personal care and home applications. Its adherence to strict regulatory standards makes it a reliable choice for formulators seeking a compliant and appealing fragrance solution.
